 Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 13-May-2018.)
statement:
cbv1h.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> A. y ps ) ) $.
cbv1h.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ch -> A. x ch ) ) $.
cbv1h.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x = y -> ( ps -> ch ) ) ) $.
cbv1h $p |- ( A. x A. y ph -> ( A. x ps -> A. y ch ) ) $.
